Lady Anise is...\""},{"lineNumber":9941,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、引き抜き……無駄だったでしょう？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, the attempt to recruit her... it was useless, right?\""},{"lineNumber":9942,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、仰る通りで……聞く耳も持って頂けず……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-yes, exactly... she wouldn’t even listen...\""},{"lineNumber":9943,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そもそも、アニスにまともなコミュニケーションを","translatedEnglishLine":"\"In the first place, trying to have a proper communication with Anise"},{"lineNumber":9944,"originalJapaneseLine":"　取ろうという方が間違いなんじゃないのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"is the real mistake, isn’t it?\""},{"lineNumber":9945,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや……あいつは、ゼスや千鶴子様から、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No... she would never leave Zeth or Lady Chizuruko,"},{"lineNumber":9946,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何があっても離れることはないよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"no matter what happens.\""},{"lineNumber":9947,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………は？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Huh?"},{"lineNumber":9948,"originalJapaneseLine":"　国や千鶴子に忠誠でも誓ってるってのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Are you saying she swore loyalty to the country or Lady Chizuruko?\""},{"lineNumber":9949,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そういうこと。…………たぶん、だけどね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That’s right... probably, at least.\""},{"lineNumber":9950,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それは、いったい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What exactly does that mean...\""},{"lineNumber":9951,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あーー……そうだな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... well."},{"lineNumber":9952,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まあ、話した方が納得して頂ける、か」","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe it’s better if I just explain it to you.\""},{"lineNumber":9953,"originalJapaneseLine":"そもそも……アニスは、","translatedEnglishLine":"First of all... Anise,"},{"lineNumber":9954,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼスでなければ生まれて来れなかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"could not have been born anywhere but Zeth."},{"lineNumber":9955,"originalJapaneseLine":"あの魔力は生まれつきでね。","translatedEnglishLine":"That magical power is innate."},{"lineNumber":9956,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔力を制御するアイテムが普及してなかったら、","translatedEnglishLine":"If items to control magical power had not been widespread,"},{"lineNumber":9957,"originalJapaneseLine":"産声を上げた時の暴走で自分ごと消し飛んでた。","translatedEnglishLine":"she would have exploded herself in a rampage the moment she cried at birth."},{"lineNumber":9958,"originalJapaneseLine":"その時はそれで事なきを得たが、","translatedEnglishLine":"That time it was somehow avoided,"},{"lineNumber":9959,"originalJapaneseLine":"一事が万事そのノリだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"but everything has been like that ever since."},{"lineNumber":9960,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかも、成長するに従って魔力は増した。魔力だけ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Moreover, as she grew, her magical power increased. Only her magical power."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……で、なんで俺様まで呼ばれるんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...So, why am I even being called here?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「総統閣下には、ゼスとの間を取りなして頂きたく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We would like His Excellency the Supreme Commander to mediate between us and Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誓って、無断で人材を掠め取るつもり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I swear, we have no intention of stealing personnel without permission

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ではありませんので、その旨を……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so we ask you to keep that in mind..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まさかタダでやらせるつもりじゃなかろうな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You don't expect me to do it for free, do you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とんでもございません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Absolutely not.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もちろん、しっかりとお礼を、お望みの形で……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course, we will properly thank you in whatever way you desire..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほう……まあいいだろう。おいアニス、どうする？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh... well, that's fine. Hey Anise, what do you say?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市の将軍様だと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The general of the Free City is asking."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は？　自由都市？　行きませんよ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? Free City? I’m not going there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アニスには千鶴子様のお手伝いをするという
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anise has an important job helping Lady Chizuruko,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大事な仕事がありますから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so she won’t be leaving."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うっ……そ、そこをなんとか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... p-please reconsider!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦争後でも構いませんし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It doesn’t have to be until after the war,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 条件があれば検討させて頂きますゆえ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and if you have conditions, we will consider them...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ゼスじゃないとこには住めないです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I cannot live anywhere but Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ではー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 壁を突き破って、アニスは空高く舞っていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Breaking through the wall, Anise soared high into the sky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……物を壊さんと移動できんのか、あいつは」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Can’t she move without breaking things?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むう……残念です……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... that's disappointing...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とりつく島もありませんでしたな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was no way to reason with her..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、残念だったな。諦めろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, that’s too bad. Give it up."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし……我が都市にとっては死活問題。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But... this is a matter of life and death for our city.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 強大な防衛力を得られる好機なのです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is a great opportunity to gain strong defensive power.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アニス様に、なんとか翻意を……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please, somehow get Lady Anise to change her mind..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と、使者の言葉を遮るように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, cutting off the messenger’s words,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軽やかなノックの音が響いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a light knocking sound echoed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだ、誰だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What is it? Who is it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ……ぜ、ゼスの……将軍殿……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "S-sir... the general from Zeth...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よ、っと……やぁ、失礼しますよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh, uh... hey, excuse me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統、うちの者が来てなかったかい？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Commander, has anyone from my side arrived?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだ、キザ野郎か。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, it’s that flashy guy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アニスならさっき帰ったぞ。ほれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anise already left a little while ago. Look."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが指を向けた先には、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where Lance pointed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間大の穴が開いた壁がある。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there was a human-sized hole in the wall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「分かりやすい……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "How obvious..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「千鶴子様が動けないからって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because Lady Chizuruko can’t move,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わざわざ迎えに来たんだが……無駄だったか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I came all the way to pick her up... but it was in vain."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「将軍殿……炎軍のサイアス・クラウン殿ですな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "General... you are Saius Crown of the Flame Army, correct?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その……アニス様は…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well... Lady Anise is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、引き抜き……無駄だったでしょう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, the attempt to recruit her... it was useless, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、仰る通りで……聞く耳も持って頂けず……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-yes, exactly... she wouldn’t even listen..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そもそも、アニスにまともなコミュニケーションを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In the first place, trying to have a proper communication with Anise

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 取ろうという方が間違いなんじゃないのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is the real mistake, isn’t it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや……あいつは、ゼスや千鶴子様から、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No... she would never leave Zeth or Lady Chizuruko,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何があっても離れることはないよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: no matter what happens."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 国や千鶴子に忠誠でも誓ってるってのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you saying she swore loyalty to the country or Lady Chizuruko?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そういうこと。…………たぶん、だけどね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That’s right... probably, at least."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは、いったい……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What exactly does that mean..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あーー……そうだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まあ、話した方が納得して頂ける、か」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe it’s better if I just explain it to you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そもそも……アニスは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: First of all... Anise,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスでなければ生まれて来れなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: could not have been born anywhere but Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの魔力は生まれつきでね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That magical power is innate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔力を制御するアイテムが普及してなかったら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If items to control magical power had not been widespread,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 産声を上げた時の暴走で自分ごと消し飛んでた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she would have exploded herself in a rampage the moment she cried at birth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その時はそれで事なきを得たが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That time it was somehow avoided,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一事が万事そのノリだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but everything has been like that ever since.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかも、成長するに従って魔力は増した。魔力だけ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Moreover, as she grew, her magical power increased. Only her magical power.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

Anise,"},{"lineNumber":9954,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼスでなければ生まれて来れなかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"could not have been born anywhere but Zeth."},{"lineNumber":9955,"originalJapaneseLine":"あの魔力は生まれつきでね。","translatedEnglishLine":"That magical power is innate."},{"lineNumber":9956,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔力を制御するアイテムが普及してなかったら、","translatedEnglishLine":"If items to control magical power had not been widespread,"},{"lineNumber":9957,"originalJapaneseLine":"産声を上げた時の暴走で自分ごと消し飛んでた。","translatedEnglishLine":"she would have exploded herself in a rampage the moment she cried at birth."},{"lineNumber":9958,"originalJapaneseLine":"その時はそれで事なきを得たが、","translatedEnglishLine":"That time it was somehow avoided,"},{"lineNumber":9959,"originalJapaneseLine":"一事が万事そのノリだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"but everything has been like that ever since."},{"lineNumber":9960,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかも、成長するに従って魔力は増した。魔力だけ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Moreover, as she grew, her magical power increased. Only her magical power."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……で、なんで俺様まで呼ばれるんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...So, why am I even being called here?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「総統閣下には、ゼスとの間を取りなして頂きたく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We would like His Excellency the Supreme Commander to mediate between us and Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誓って、無断で人材を掠め取るつもり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I swear, we have no intention of stealing personnel without permission

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ではありませんので、その旨を……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so we ask you to keep that in mind..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まさかタダでやらせるつもりじゃなかろうな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You don't expect me to do it for free, do you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とんでもございません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Absolutely not.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もちろん、しっかりとお礼を、お望みの形で……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course, we will properly thank you in whatever way you desire..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほう……まあいいだろう。おいアニス、どうする？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh... well, that's fine. Hey Anise, what do you say?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市の将軍様だと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The general of the Free City is asking."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は？　自由都市？　行きませんよ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? Free City? I’m not going there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アニスには千鶴子様のお手伝いをするという
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anise has an important job helping Lady Chizuruko,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大事な仕事がありますから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so she won’t be leaving."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うっ……そ、そこをなんとか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... p-please reconsider!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦争後でも構いませんし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It doesn’t have to be until after the war,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 条件があれば検討させて頂きますゆえ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and if you have conditions, we will consider them...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ゼスじゃないとこには住めないです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I cannot live anywhere but Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ではー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 壁を突き破って、アニスは空高く舞っていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Breaking through the wall, Anise soared high into the sky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……物を壊さんと移動できんのか、あいつは」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Can’t she move without breaking things?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むう……残念です……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... that's disappointing...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とりつく島もありませんでしたな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was no way to reason with her..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、残念だったな。諦めろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, that’s too bad. Give it up."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし……我が都市にとっては死活問題。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But... this is a matter of life and death for our city.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 強大な防衛力を得られる好機なのです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is a great opportunity to gain strong defensive power.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アニス様に、なんとか翻意を……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please, somehow get Lady Anise to change her mind..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と、使者の言葉を遮るように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, cutting off the messenger’s words,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軽やかなノックの音が響いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a light knocking sound echoed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだ、誰だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What is it? Who is it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ……ぜ、ゼスの……将軍殿……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "S-sir... the general from Zeth...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よ、っと……やぁ、失礼しますよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh, uh... hey, excuse me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統、うちの者が来てなかったかい？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Commander, has anyone from my side arrived?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだ、キザ野郎か。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, it’s that flashy guy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アニスならさっき帰ったぞ。ほれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anise already left a little while ago. Look."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが指を向けた先には、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where Lance pointed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間大の穴が開いた壁がある。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there was a human-sized hole in the wall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「分かりやすい……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "How obvious..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「千鶴子様が動けないからって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because Lady Chizuruko can’t move,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わざわざ迎えに来たんだが……無駄だったか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I came all the way to pick her up... but it was in vain."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「将軍殿……炎軍のサイアス・クラウン殿ですな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "General... you are Saius Crown of the Flame Army, correct?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その……アニス様は…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well... Lady Anise is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、引き抜き……無駄だったでしょう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, the attempt to recruit her... it was useless, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、仰る通りで……聞く耳も持って頂けず……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-yes, exactly... she wouldn’t even listen..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そもそも、アニスにまともなコミュニケーションを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In the first place, trying to have a proper communication with Anise

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 取ろうという方が間違いなんじゃないのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is the real mistake, isn’t it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや……あいつは、ゼスや千鶴子様から、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No... she would never leave Zeth or Lady Chizuruko,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何があっても離れることはないよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: no matter what happens."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 国や千鶴子に忠誠でも誓ってるってのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you saying she swore loyalty to the country or Lady Chizuruko?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そういうこと。…………たぶん、だけどね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That’s right... probably, at least."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは、いったい……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What exactly does that mean..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あーー……そうだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まあ、話した方が納得して頂ける、か」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe it’s better if I just explain it to you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そもそも……アニスは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: First of all... Anise,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスでなければ生まれて来れなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: could not have been born anywhere but Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの魔力は生まれつきでね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That magical power is innate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔力を制御するアイテムが普及してなかったら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If items to control magical power had not been widespread,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 産声を上げた時の暴走で自分ごと消し飛んでた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she would have exploded herself in a rampage the moment she cried at birth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その時はそれで事なきを得たが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That time it was somehow avoided,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一事が万事そのノリだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but everything has been like that ever since.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかも、成長するに従って魔力は増した。魔力だけ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Moreover, as she grew, her magical power increased. Only her magical power.
